snippet.title: Milo and the Christmas Gift - Release trailer
snippet.description:
🐰 Milo and the Christmas Gift 🐈‍⬛🎁 Out Now on Steam for FREE, just in time for Christmas! 🎄 

Johan Scherft's new beautiful hand-painted spin-off adventure game is now available on:

🎁  Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2716140/Milo_and_the_Christmas_Gift/
🐾  Itchio: https://secondmaze.itch.io/milo-and-the-christmas-gift

Milo and the Christmas Gift is a short free-to-play point-and-click adventure created by artist Johan Scherft to celebrate the Winter Holidays. The game is a spin-off story following the events in Milo and the Magpies

Can you help Milo find Toby? 😼

A huge thank you to Johan Scherft for once again working with us and giving us the gift of publishing another lovely, free-to-play, adventure with Milo, just in time for the Winter Holidays! This Christmas Gift was wrapped by many talented people: Johan with his beautiful art and creative storytelling, Victor Butzelaar who sprinkled holiday cheer into every chapter with his wonderful music, Jeroen Wimmers who once again worked his code magic,  our lovely voice actors Kimmy Wolfe (@KimmykimsPlays) and GlitchKraft (@GlitchKraft) who gave life to Yvonne and Marleen, Bob Rafferty who put together this lovely festive trailer and last but not least all our awesome translators and testers - thank you all! 🙏

Please consider leaving Milo and Toby a Christmas Gift this year by leaving a review to let us know what you think! 😻 

Thank you all for your incredible support 🐈‍⬛

🎬  Trailer by Bob Rafferty 
🎵 Music by Victor Butzelaar

Thank you all for your awesome support,

Second Maze Team

Like and follow:
📷 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/secondmaze/
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/second_maze
♪ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@secondmaze
📘  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/secondmazestudios
💬 Discord: https://www.discord.gg/tsZ2XuuDPW
📬 And please subscribe to our mailing list: http://eepurl.com/hHIqvn
